Name: Simple Sailing
About the game: SimpleSailing is a simple sailing simulator game You get to sail your boat and enjoy the water experience GAME FEATURES - relaxing game to play - choose among different boats to unlock as you complete races - learn basics of sailing in a fun and enjoyable way
